results.title: Les Miserables
results.creator_credit: Richard Boleslawski, Darryl F. Zanuck and Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation
results.brief_description: Victor Hugo’s classic story of an escaped convict, Jean Valjean (Frederic March) and the detective, Inspector Javert (Charles Laughton) who trails him for a lifetime. A remarkably exciting and moving film. Co-starring Cedric Hardwicke.

results.title: Cyrano de Bergerac
results.creator_credit: Michael Gordon, Stanley Kramer and Stanley Kramer Films
results.brief_description: Based on Edmond Rostand’s classic play this film version has Jose Ferrer in an Academy Award winning performance as the long nosed Cyrano. Famous for his skill with words Cyrano mocks pompous noblemen, protects the poor and displays unmatched bravery but he nurses a secret love for his beautiful cousin Roxanne, who is also loved by a handsome but inarticulate soldier, who seeks Cyrano’s help in wooing her. Also stars Mala Powers and William Prince.

results.title: Orpheus
results.brief_description: A compelling cinematic allegory of the haunting legend of Eurydice and Orpheus set in modern times, with poet Marais encountering The Princess of Death. Orpheus was allowed to reclaim his dead lover on the condition he did not look back upon her face. But he does … An unforgettable experience of true love, with beautiful music and poetic cinematic effects. Rated: M

results.title: A Taxing woman
results.creator_credit: Juzo Itami, Seigo Hosogoe and Yasushi Tamaoki
results.brief_description: Evading taxes is a popular pastime in “The Land of the Rising Yen”, especially among the predatory real estate tycoons who, in collusion with politicians, gangsters and large “straight” business combines, have made Japan’s land prices the highest in the world. To combat this pandemic “lawlessness” there is a national tax police, who, with their almost storm trooper tactics, make America’s much maligned IRS inspectors seem almost helpful. In Japanese with English subtitles.

results.title: Undercover
results.creator_credit: David Stevens, David Elfick, Filmco and Palm Beach Pictures
results.brief_description: Join in the singing, the flag-waving, the dancing, the scandal and the fights that made the roaring twenties such an exciting and memorable time for Australia. Undercover catches the glitter and madness of those times and follows one typical Australian whose imagination, drive and energy turned his impossible dream into reality. Stars Genevieve Picot.

results.title: The Funeral
results.creator_credit: Juzo Itami, Yasushi Tamaoki and Yutaka Okada
results.brief_description: The Funeral is a story about three days in which a married couple, an actor and an actress, must preside over a traditional, Japanese funeral for a member of the family. Their confusion, the complex demands this situation presents and the reactions of other participants create a story that is simultaneously comic, sad and moving.

results.title: Tampopo
results.creator_credit: Juzo Itami, Seigo Hosogoe, Yasushi Tamaoki, Itami Productions and New Century
results.brief_description: Hilarious Japanese comedy about two truckdrivers, Goro (a noodle connoisseur) and Gun, who stop at a non-de-script noodle restaurant where they encounter its proprietor, Tampopo, and her bullying admirer Pisken. Goro is beaten up by Pisken and his associates and he awakens on the floor of Tampopo’s restaurant. She asks him to help her save her restaurant and so the search for the perfect noodle is begun, with the help of an odd assortment of characters, food, wine and a touch of sex.

results.title: Melo
results.brief_description: Pierre and Maniche are happily married until she meets Marcel, Pierre’s friend. Romaine and Marcel have an affair which ends tragically. Pierre remarries and before leaving the country he visits Marcel to learn the truth about Romaine. In French with English subtitles.

results.title: The Overlanders
results.creator_credit: Harry Watt, Ralph Smart, Sir Michael Balcon and Ealing Studios
results.brief_description: Although superficially comparable with cattle drive Westerns like Red River, the emphasis in this film is on the cooperative nature of the enterprise - a cattle drive from Northern Australia in 1942 to escape the Japanese - rather than on notions of individualism at the centre of the western ethos. Starring Chips Rafferty, The Overlanders is a documentary in spirit, recreating the hazards of an epic drive and carefully assembling the mannerisms, vocabulary and attitudes to characterize the Australian bushman. There was also a strong role for a woman - Daphne Campbell as Mary Parsons - carrying on the tradition of the bush heroine established in Australian films of the twenties and thirties. Based on an actual cattle drive of 1942 organised by the government of Northern Australia to remove supplies from the reach of the Japanese. Cast also includes John Nugent Hayward.

results.title: Moving Out
results.brief_description: Being a teenager can be hard enough. Being an Italian teenager in a very Australian suburb can be impossible! Gino wants to be Australian. After all, we’re all new Aussies, some are just newer than others. Gino doesn’t give up and when he has finally won the friendship of his Australian mates, it’s time to move out!
